si.title: කථානායකවරයා ඉල්ලා අස්විය
body_lines: කථානායක අශෝක සභූමාල් රංගල තම කථිකයා ලෙස ඉල්ලා අස්වීමට තීරණය කර තිබේ.

en.title: The Speaker resigned
body_lines: Speaker Asoka Sabumal Rangwala has decided to resign as his Speaker.

summary_lines: Speaker Asoka Sabumal Rangwala has announced his resignation from the position of Speaker. This decision comes after [brief mention of reasons or context]. The resignation will take effect on [date].
